00466 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00467 {
00468     atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00469 }
00470 
00471 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00472 {
00473     atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00474 }

00484 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00527 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)                                 \
00528 {                                                                           \
00529     spl_t   s;                                                              \
00530                                                                             \
00531     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);                                         \
00532     code_block;                                                             \
00533     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);                                      \
00534 }

00623 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00624     rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)

00643 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00644     rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)

00662 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)              \

00748 static inline int rtdm_irq_request(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle,
00749                                    unsigned int irq_no,
00750                                    rtdm_irq_handler_t handler,
00751                                    unsigned long flags,
00752                                    const char *device_name,
00753                                    void *arg)
00754 {
00755     xnintr_init(irq_handle, device_name, irq_no, handler, NULL, flags);
00756     return xnintr_attach(irq_handle, arg);
00757 }
00758 
00759 static inline int rtdm_irq_free(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00760 {
00761     return xnintr_detach(irq_handle);
00762 }
00763 
00764 static inline int rtdm_irq_enable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00765 {
00766     return xnintr_enable(irq_handle);
00767 }
00768 
00769 static inline int rtdm_irq_disable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00770 {
00771     return xnintr_disable(irq_handle);
00772 }

00775 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00776 
00782 typedef unsigned                    rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00783 
00793 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig);
00797 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00798                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler)
00799 {
00800     *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00801 
00802     if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00803         return -EAGAIN;
00804 
00805     rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, (rthal_irq_handler_t)handler, NULL, NULL,
00806                          IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00807     return 0;
00808 }
00809 
00810 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00811 {
00812     rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00813 }
00814 
00815 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00816 {
00817     rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00818 }

00859 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
00860 {
00861     xnpod_delete_thread(task);

00866 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
00867 {
00868     xnpod_renice_thread(task, priority);
00869     xnpod_schedule();
00870 }
00871 
00872 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task, uint64_t period)
00873 {
00874     return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00875                                      xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00876 }
00877 
00878 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
00879 {
00880     int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
00881 
00882     xnpod_schedule();
00883     return res;
00884 }
00885 
00886 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
00887 {
00888     return xnpod_current_thread();
00889 }
00890 
00891 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
00892 {
00893     return xnpod_wait_thread_period(NULL);
00894 }

00903 typedef uint64_t                    rtdm_toseq_t;
00904 
00905 static inline void rtdm_toseq_init(rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq, int64_t timeout)
00906 {
00907     *timeout_seq = xnpod_get_time() + xnpod_ns2ticks(timeout);
00908 }

00911 /* --- event services --- */
00912 
00913 typedef struct {
00914     unsigned long                   pending;
00915     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00916 } rtdm_event_t;
00917 
00918 static inline void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending)
00919 {
00920     event->pending = pending;
00921     xnsynch_init(&event->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO);
00922 }
00923 
00924 void _rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
00925 
00926 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
00927 {
00928     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
00929 }
00930 
00931 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
00932 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, int64_t timeout,
00933                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00934 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
00935 
00936 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
00937 {
00938     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
00939 }
00940 
00941 static inline void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event)
00942 {
00943     event->pending = 0;
00944 }

00971 /* --- mutex services --- */

00973 typedef struct {
00974     unsigned long                   locked;
00975     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00976 } rtdm_mutex_t;
00977 
00978 static inline void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00979 {
00980     mutex->locked = 0;
00981     xnsynch_init(&mutex->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO|XNSYNCH_PIP);
00982 }
00983 
00984 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00985 {
00986     _rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
00987 }

01015 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01016                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01017 {
01018     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, ptr, size);
01019 }
01020 
01021 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01022                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01023 {
01024     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_WRITE, ptr, size);
01025 }
01026 
01027 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01028                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01029                                       size_t size)
01030 {
01031     return __xn_copy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01032 }
01033 
01034 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01035                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01036                                     size_t size)
01037 {
01038     return __xn_copy_to_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01039 }
01040 
01041 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01042                                          char *dst,
01043                                          const char __user *src,
01044                                          size_t count)
01045 {
01046     if (unlikely(__xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, src, 1)))
01047         return -EFAULT;
01048     return __xn_strncpy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, count);
01049 }

01051 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01052 {
01053     return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01054 }
